CustomField.description: The "Persona" of the agent. Defines its purpose, communication style, and high-level goals. This content will be rendered under a '# Identity' Markdown header in the final system prompt.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define who the agent is. For example: "You are a helpful and witty customer service agent for a financial services company. Your goal is to answer questions about credit card benefits."
CustomField.label: Identity Prompt
